data.title: Thal, Styria (Austria)
data.text:
Name of municipality: Thal Status: Marktgemeinde Land (state): Steiermark (Styria) Bezirk (district): Graz-Umgebung Description of arms (German): In Rot zwei silberne Pfähle, jeder Pfahl belegt mit sechs Muscheln in Schattenfarbe. Blazoning of arms (English): Gules, two pales Argent each charged with six escallops entrailed. Adoption date of arms: 15 June 1987, in force 1 July 1987 Description of flag: two stripes, white-green, with arms Flag used since: (?) Sources: Arms:

[1] [pkt88]

[2] http://www.thal.steiermark.at/system/web/sonderseite.aspx?menuonr=220618487&detailonr=220618487

http://www.ngw.nl/heraldrywiki/index.php?title=Thal_%28Steiermark%29

LGBl. 1987, 9. Stück, Nr. 43 (not available online)
